jsdp.sdp

Class BackwardRecursion

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsdp.sdp.Recursion
      • jsdp.sdp.BackwardRecursion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackwardRecursionImpl, BackwardRecursionImpl, sS_BackwardRecursion

    public abstract class BackwardRecursion
extends Recursion
    Implements a backward recursion algorithm to solve a stochastic dynamic program.
    Author:
    Roberto Rossi

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class jsdp.sdp.Recursion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void generateStates()
      Generates the complete state space for the discrete time, discrete space, stochastic dynamic program.
      MonitoringInterfaceBackward getMonitoringInterfaceBackward() 
      protected void recurse(int period)
      Backward recursion step; in order to run the recursion step for period period the recursion step must have been already run for all subsequent periods.
      void runBackwardRecursion()
      Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program.
      void runBackwardRecursion(int period)
      Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program from period period up to the end of the planning horizon.

      Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program.

      Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program from period period up to the end of the planning horizon.

    • Method Detail

      • getMonitoringInterfaceBackward

        public void runBackwardRecursionMonitoring()
        Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program.

      • runBackwardRecursion

        public void runBackwardRecursion()
        Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program.

      • runBackwardRecursionMonitoring

        public void runBackwardRecursionMonitoring(int period)
        Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program from period period up to the end of the planning horizon. This implementation of the backward recursion algorithm assumes that the idempotent action is selected in period period.
        Parameters:
        period - the starting period.

      • runBackwardRecursion

        public void runBackwardRecursion(int period)
        Runs the backward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program from period period up to the end of the planning horizon. This implementation of the backward recursion algorithm assumes that the idempotent action is selected in period period.
        Parameters:
        period - the starting period.

      • generateStates

        protected void generateStates()
        Generates the complete state space for the discrete time, discrete space, stochastic dynamic program.

      • recurse

        protected void recurse(int period)
        Backward recursion step; in order to run the recursion step for period period the recursion step must have been already run for all subsequent periods.
        Parameters:
        period - the target period for the step.
